message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/PlanetData 

Generate mapping ontology, based on Reveltyx work (Feb 2011, Freddy). Provide results here and in PlanetData wiki
Ontology :
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/531378/mappingpedia/mappingpedia-ontology.owl
Report :
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/531378/mappingpedia/rdb2rdf-mapping-vocabulary-report.pdf
Provide a catalogue of mappings (March 2011, Freddy/José Mora). Provide results here and in PlanetData wiki
R2O mappings catalogue :
MappingPedia
Freddy (end August 2011). Year 1: Mapping- based Data provisioning (RDB2RDF) tools. Catalogue of these tools (D2R, ODEMapster, etc.) (take it from the W3C RDB2RDF working group)
Year 1: SPARQL endpoint with populated mapping ontology.
http://mappingpedia.linkeddata.es/sparql
Year 1: Generate
http://mappingpedia.linkedata.es
, wiki-style or something like that (scraperwiki-like)
OSCAR (end August 2011): Generate a best practices document for sensor data provisioning (from WP1, and based on work at AEMET), looking like a use case description like the LATC data provisioning library one
Year 2: Maintaining mappingpedia + extending this to other data provisioning tools (sensors, excel, etc.)
Year 2: Think of mapping generation games for generating more stuff into mappingpedia.linkeddata.es (Freddy)
T4.1. Assembly and maintenance of the PlanetData data set catalogue (Leader: FUB).

Generate real-time linked open data set. Tasks identified in
http://planet-data-wiki.sti2.at/web/Data_Provisioning#Planet_Data_Vocabularies
.
State of the art of OGC Sensor Web Enablement, Pachube, Sensorbase, etc.
Survey datasets that provide those services (e.g., OGC SOS services, Pachube, datamarket, infochimps)
Propose a vocabulary, aligned with CKAN, DataOne proposals, etc., to describe sensor-based datasets.
Material
DataCite Metadata Scheme (
http://datacite.org/schema/DataCite-MetadataKernel_v2.0.pdf
)
DSPL: Dataset Publishing Language (
http://code.google.com/apis/publicdata/
)
Upload CKAN descriptions of UPM datasets and inform Pablo Mendes about it
http://geo.linkeddata.es/
http://aemet.linkeddata.es/
http://cultura.linkeddata.es/
Biodiversity observatory at Spain
ISTAC
Barcelona and smart Santander
EOI companies
Ajuntament de Lleida
Provide ingestion tools to fill in the catalogue automatically from OGC SOS services, Pachube, etc.
Transformation tools for sensors platform (eg: Pachube) description to SSN Ontology (Spring 2011)
Pachube2RDF
María will be providing a framework for (Linked Data) ontology quality based on the analysis of LOV vocabularies, and will be curating this data. This can be part of the general catalogue, and we will align with Pablo on this.
The final product should be a datamarket.com for sensor-based data
Material:
SSG4Env D5.2v2 (High-level API) + D3.3v2 (registry)
Freddy will continue pursuing the idea of a "mappingpedia" (that is, a catalogue/kb of mappings that people are using) and will feed the data provisioning catalogue.
Additional ideas (not to be implemented yet)
Catalogue of datasets transformed into stRDF ???
Next steps (year 2 of PlanetData): Semantic catalogue of the IDEE...
WP 6 Training

T6.1. Training materials and open training infrastructure (Leader: STI2)

Collect UPM materials and categorize them based on PlanetData curriculum.
Continue video scientific journal (Oscar, together with Elena).
References

Gaber, M, M., Zaslavsky, A., and Krishnaswamy, S.,
Mining Data Streams: A Review
, in ACM SIGMOD Record, Vol. 34, No. 1, June 2005, ISSN: 0163-5808
speaker: SYSTEM
